discourse_list.title: Collateral Onboarding Call #43: Fei & Rari Pools Use Cases

content.content: Collateral Onboarding Call #43 |  Fei & Rari Pools Use cases       MIP6 The Fei Protocol recently submitted a MIP6 to onboard their stablecoin, FEI, as a collateral. The team behind Fei will be hosting a community AMA to explore the possible use cases for this token within the MakerDAO ecosystem, ranging from a standard vault, D3M, or even a PSM.  Rari Pools? Our guests will also take the time to discuss different possibilities and potential integrations. Do you have any cool ideas? Do you want to pitch Joey on the next great pool?  Join us Join us 2022-05-11T15:00:00Z as we host Joey Santoro @joey & Brianna Montgomery @bpm6867 from Fei Protocol to lead a discussion into Fei v2, the mutual benefits from onboarding, and answer any of the community’s questions.  Agenda    Intro by @juan & @retro  Presentation by Fei Protocol’s Joey Santoro & Brianna Montgomery Community Q&A   [MIP6] FEI Collateral Onboarding Application   While filled as a MIP6, this proposal can be seen (and converted) to a D3M (or even a PSM). It is suggested to have a good overcollateralization, meaning that the only use case for this vault will be Tribe Protocol to put FEI as collateral to mint DAI. The Tribe DAO will use this loan to finance its balance sheet and provide a better peg for its users. Moreover, with the stablecoin war starting and CeFi stablecoins winning the DeFi space, it makes sense to partner with other stablecoin issuers to push DeFi stablecoins ahead. FEI is already pegged to DAI with 10bps fees. This vault will allow Fei to decrease conversion fees. Tribe DAO is also managing Fuse so this will be complementary to the Fuse D3M discussion … The use cases for MakerDAO are: Generate a yield and decrease USDC exposure. The FEI vault will be akin to a super-senior DAI loan to Fei Protocol (D3M-like). Being overcollateralized in FEI, MakerDAO would enjoy more protection than FEI holders. Taking the role of a decentral bank by providing temporary liquidity to stablecoin issuers when needed. This was already discussed on MakerDAO forum in the Intra DeFi stablecoin issuers money-market. Long term such arrangement will make DeFi stablecoins safer.   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-05-11T15:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where Crowdcast Call   crowdcast    Collateral Onboarding Call #43 | Fei Protocol Register now for Collateral Onboarding Call #43 | Fei Protocol on crowdcast, scheduled to go live on May 11, 2022, 10:00 AM CDT.       Attn: @SES-Core-Unit, @gov-comms-core-unit, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit, @Growth-Core-Unit, @daif-core-unit, @Protocol-Engineering, @Oracles-Core-Unit, @Risk-Core-Unit, @Real-World-Finance, @strat-fin-core-unit, @Recognized-Delegates

Collateral Onboarding Call - Episode #43  May 11th, 2022  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Retro  00:37: Fei & Rari Pools Use Cases with Joey Santoro and Brianna Montgomery.  10:49: Q&A and Discussion about Fei   Video https://youtu.be/6pvggvsHpv0  Introduction  Retro  Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Welcome to the Collateral Onboarding Call episode #43. Today we are joined by Tribe DAO. Joey and Brianna want to share more detail about their MIP6 application for onboarding Fei, a collateral type to the MakerDAO protocol, and a stablecoin. Discussions about collateral happen in the Forum.    Fei & Rari Pools Use Cases  [FEI] MIP6 Collateral Onboarding Application   Joey Santoro and Brianna Montgomery  Presentation 00:37  Tribe DAO1632×928 57.2 KB   Why FEI?1631×931 117 KB   FEI is backed by decentralized collateral1630×925 73.5 KB   FEI Stability and redeemability1630×929 98.8 KB   MIP6 - Collateral Onboarding of FEI1630×926 107 KB   Looking for the future1629×925 104 KB   MakerDAO using Tribe Turbo1632×1080 107 KB   Discussion  10:49 - Marko Stemberger: Is the Fei peg issue less than one dollar, how does the DAI PSM help here? 16:33 - Primoz Kordez: At what capacity do other PSMs work? Any “capital controls”? 17:31 - Marko Stemberger: Is there a dashboard that shows stats for the PSMs? 21:36 - Retro: Can you talk about the V2 upgrade in terms of how it should support the onboarding? 24:47 - LongForWisdom: At what point do you bail on the volatile PCV in a black-swan event? Like Maker maintains the over-collateralization by liquidating users below that ratio. How does Fei maintain the over-collateralization in that situation, or would it allow Fei to become undercollateralized? 26:56 - Primoz Kordez: What is the intended use case for the 100M facility again, DAI yield generation or FEI market-making activities? 31:11 - ElPro: Can you provide more color on how FEI adopts ERC4626 and what benefits it can provide to a possible partnership with MakerDAO? The last audit was July 21st, are you slated to have a new audit in 2022? 39:20 - Marko Stemberger: Do you have any comment on why the price is still less than one dollar, even though you can achieve 15% APR? 42:13 - LongForWisdom: What makes the vault better than just selling volatile PCV for DAI? 43:57 - Retro: What is the best way to get a hold of you? 44:41 - Retro: Do you have anything else that you would like to add?   Closing Comment  Retro  Outro 45:16  Thank you for making time in your schedule to speak with the community here. The conversation is always ongoing at forum.makerdao.com. I want to thank everybody for joining, and we will see you around in the forums. Thanks, everyone.   Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
